title.rendered: Best 10 Comedy Movies of the Last 20 Years

content.rendered:
Comedy is one of the most relative genres of cinema. We can’t expect everything to feel funny to everyone at the same time. For this reason, most comedy movies make simple and vulgar jokes, and if characters get into unfamiliar situations, those jokes will be funny. Especially if we are watching comedy in a foreign language, the difference in culture can spoil the whole entertainment. However, there are also productions that stand out from all these. We have listed the best comedy movies of the last 20 years for you.

Best comedy movies of the last 20 years (highest to lowest according to IMDb score)

  • Hannah Gadsby: Nanette – 8.4 IMDB
  • 3 Idiots  8.4 IMDB
  • Snatch – 8.3 IMDB
  • P.K Pekaay – 8.2 IMDB
  • Deadpool – 8.0 IMDB
  • The Grand Budapest Hotel – 8.0 IMDB
  • Shaun Of The Dead – 8.0 IMDB
  • In Bruges – 7.9 IMDB
  • Hot Fuzz – 7.8 IMDB
  • The Hangover  7.8 IMDB
  • 500 Days Of Summer – 7.7 IMDB
  • Superbad – 7.6 IMDB
  • Tucker and Dale vs. Evil – 7.5 IMDB
  • Death at a Funeral – 7.4 IMDB
  • 21 Jump Street – 7.2 IMDB
  • Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy 7.2 IMDB
  • Team America: World Police – 7.2 IMDB
  • Easy A –  7.1 IMDB

Hannah Gadsby: Nanette

  • Year: 2018
  • IMDb: 8.4
  • Stars: Hannah Gadsby

This work, which appears as a Netflix project, appears as a blending of a stand up show as a film. This film, which focuses on gender, gender discrimination and different issues related to childhood, both incorporates criticisms of today’s society and offers a solid viewing pleasure with its quality of humor.

3 Idiots

  • Year: 2009
  • IMDb: 8.4
  • Stars:  Aamir Khan, Madhavan, Mona Singh

It’s a movie that many people know and think they’ve already watched. With Aamir Khan’s magnificent acting and great team harmony in the content, this bezelebi movie creates a pleasant and devoted environment for everyone. The fact that education criticism is so intense and full is possible with a strong scenario. A movie that you will definitely enjoy and even get angry with is waiting for you.

Snatch

  • Year: 2000
  • IMDb: 8.3
  • Stars: Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro

Snatch, which was released in the early 2000s and received a good production in both comedy and action genres, deals with two different issues concerning the underground criminal organization. The subjects are so connected with each other that you see what a beautiful scenario two different stories are woven in the event. Perhaps the best version of the term returning to Arabian hair is the content of this movie. You should have a look.

P.K Pekaay

  • Year: 2014
  • IMDb: 8.2
  • Stars:  Aamir Khan, Anushka Sharma, Sanjay Dutt

This film, in which social problems are dealt with in a funny and entertaining way, brings up many quests, from questions of religion to us. The handling of the subject and the story is so beautiful that this movie, which is loved by many, is at the forefront in a very effective and innovative structure in terms of script. You can see all the stages and different opportunities with a single click. Because the movie progresses gradually. We wish you an enjoyable time in advance.

Deadpool

  • Year: 2016
  • IMDb: 8.0
  • Stars: Ryan Reynolds, Morena Baccarin, T.J. Miller

Deadpool, one of the most beloved and newest superheroes of Marvel Movies, conveys what happened to Wilson, who was diagnosed with cancer. You can look forward to watching the stories of a super karhem that is both enjoyable and somewhat extraordinary. Because it has a very exciting and funny scenario.

The Grand Budapest Hotel

  • Year: 2014
  • IMDb: 8.0
  • Stars: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric

This film, which deals with many points of the Second World War, has a unique style and contains many social messages. The Grand Budapest Hotel, which is a film about these periods, reflects the friendship of the two employees. The adventures of these two can be both funny and somewhat shocking.

Shaun Of The Dead

  • Year: 2004
  • IMDb: 8.0 Puan
  • Stars: Simon Pegg, Nick Frost, Kate Ashfield

This movie is an important movie that has harsh criticism of zombies and horror movies. Consequently, it covers some events in depth and makes an important statement on this subject for everyone. For this reason, we can say that it is the kind of movie that you will be eagerly anticipating and want to continue.

In Bruges

  • Year: 2008
  • IMDb: 7,9
  • Stars:  Will Ferrell, John C. Reilly, Mary Steenburgen

Ray and Ken, two hitmen, are sent on vacation to Bruges, the romantic Belgian city, by their boss Harry Waters after a difficult job. Then their paths cross somehow. The events that followed will indeed bring about funny elements.

Hot Fuzz

  • Year: 2007
  • IMDb: 7,8
  • Stars:  Simon Pegg, Nick Frost, Martin Freeman

Nicholas Angel is a zealous police officer who excels at his job. He has a higher arrest rate than anyone else in London. One day he learns that he has been promoted as a sergeant, but has also been assigned to a provincial town. Of course, he breaks down, but folds because of his love of duty. Then things change a lot and start to grow. So what happens next?

The Hangover

  • Year: 2009
  • IMDb: 7.8
  • Stars: Zach Galifianakis, Bradley Cooper, Justin Bartha

This movie, which has an important place in foreign comedy movies, has a unique style. A group of friends traveling to Las Vegas for a pre-wedding bachelorette party does not happen. Since the story is a bit of a movie like this, it is exactly like a summer comedy. We can definitely say that it is a kind of movie where you can have a pleasant time.

excerpt.rendered: Comedy is one of the most relative genres of cinema

title.rendered: Skullcandy launches its headphones, “Hesh ANC” in India

content.rendered:
Skullcandy extended its most fans-liked Headphones with “Hesh ANC”, earlier last month. These Headphones made a tremendous success just like their previous lineup and are now headed to India. They come with an active noise cancellation like told in the name.

This Skullcandy Hesh ANC was a tough competitor to Sennheiser HD 450BT and Sony WH-CH710N within their price points. These over-ear headphones are the most affordable with active noise cancellation and are placed alongside to the Venue and Crusher ANC in the lineup.

Specifications and Pricing;

The Hesh ANC charges via USB-C port which is actually a significant upgrade after Venue which still has a micro USB port. Skullcandy advertises these headphones for 22 hours of charging on a single charge, which can actually last up to 30 hours when their active noise cancellation is turned off. They also offer 3 hours of playback with just 10-min of charging.

Now when it comes to Bluetooth connectivity, Hesh ANC equips Bluetooth 5.0 which sadly cannot be hot-swapped from ane device to another. There is still a 3.5 mm headphone jack to use when the battery drains out. They weigh almost around 230 grams.

Another intense feature in the Hesh ANC is its in-built tile, which we have seen multiple products already. These tile in the headphones helps the user to know where the headphones are, using the Skullcandy app, when they are misplaced. For audio, the headphones come with 40mm driver with 20Hz – 20KHz frequency response and an impedance of 32 Ohms.

The Skullcandy Hesh ANC cost 10,999 INR, with colour variations – True Black and White Mod. These headphones are currently available at Skullcandy.in and come with a 2-year warranty.

excerpt.rendered: Skullcandy extended its most fans-liked Headphones with “Hesh ANC”, earlier last month

title.rendered: WhatsApp soars Audio Calls and Video Calls for it’s Web Users, Reports

content.rendered:
WhatsApp is one of the god-like apps for easy Video/Internet calling services. This feature allows the users to Face Chat with ample of other accessibilities for free of cost. This feature in WhatsApp was first rolled out in 2016 respectively, which was restricted only to the Application Users.

And Finally today, after many years of wait, WhatsApp started to roll out its feature of Beta Video Calling to Desktop users. Although, It still needs your mobile to be connected to the Desktop. Since a few days, the users are receiving an update V2.2043.7 that includes the Video call/Audio call buttons on the top-right header. Also, a dedicated place is allotted to the current call.

Being this a Beta feature, Only a few users that are lucky received this. If you’re not one yet, No worries, you may have to wait for a few more weeks. We’ll soon update this article with more details – Stay connected.

excerpt.rendered: WhatsApp is one of the god-like apps for easy Video/Internet calling services

title.rendered: Xiaomi Mi 11 seen in the street! The leaks were true

content.rendered:
The countdown has begun for Mi 11, which will be Xiaomi’s new flagship. Leaks keep coming back as the countdown has begun. First, the rendering image and then the real photos started to come. According to the photos sent to us today, all previous leaks have been confirmed. According to the Mi 11 photos we shared on Twitter, the device has 3 cameras. Although there is no official statement yet, 2 devices are expected to be introduced, Mi 11 and Mi 11 Pro.

#Xiaomi Mi 11 seen in the street! pic.twitter.com/yD9aFyxdSy

— Tech in Deep (@TechinDeep) December 11, 2020

The Mi 11 model will come with a 4,780 mAh battery and 55W wired / 30W wireless charging support, according to official records. Its main camera is expected to be a 108MP resolution camera with Samsung ISOCELL HM3 sensor. It has already been officially announced that the Snapdragon 888 will be used as a processor. One of the most impressive aspects of the Mi 11 will be its 120Hz QHD + display. There is no clear leak or explanation yet about the prices of the Xiaomi Mi 11 series, which will be the continuation of the Mi 10 series. However, it seems that the flagship Mi 11 will not be offered for sale at a very cheap price compared to the old flagships.

Xiaomi Mi 11 Specification

  • Chipset: Qualcomm Snapdragon 888
  • GPU: Adreno 660
  • RAM & ROM: 8GB RAM – 128GB ROM, 12GB RAM – 256GB ROM
  • Battery: 4,780 mAh, 55W / 30W wireless charging
  • Camera: 108MP, Triple Camera
  • Front Camera: 32MP Single Camera

excerpt.rendered: The countdown has begun for Mi 11, which will be Xiaomi’s new flagship

title.rendered: RTX 3090 worth $340,000 stolen from MSI factory in China

content.rendered:
RTX 3090 worth about $ 340,000 was stolen in the incident this morning at the MSI factory in China. Stating that it suspects that the robbery was committed with insider assistance, MSI promises cash rewards to those who share information about the robbery.

According to the information reported, there were more than 200 RTX 3090s in the said cargo boxes and the total value of the stolen goods was over 330 thousand dollars. Although the official price of RTX 3090s is around $ 1,500, it is offered for sale on the black market with an average price tag of $ 2,000 due to stock problems.

Following the robbery, MSI directly notified the police units. In the statement made, it was stated that the shipping area of the factory was monitored with security cameras, every truck incoming and outgoing was inspected, so the robbery in question should have been carried out with the help of some insiders. MSI is promising 100,000 yuan (approximately $ 15,000) prize money to anyone who can provide information about the location of the stolen RTX 3090s and the identity of the thieves.

excerpt.rendered: RTX 3090 worth about $ 340,000 was stolen in the incident this morning at the MSI factory in China

title.rendered: MIUI 12.5 Announced! Here are the Features and Eligible Devices

content.rendered:
MIUI, one of the most popular mobile operating systems in the world, is the favorite of Xiaomi. While the MIUI 13 news has been out recently, MIUI 12 hasn’t been forgotten. According to the statement made today, Xiaomi is developing MIUI 12.5. This update includes major innovations and optimizations and prepares Xiaomi devices for MIUI 13.

According to the statement made by Xiaomi, tests for MIUI 12.5 started today. In order for engineers to better focus on this update, the closed Beta version will be suspended for a period starting from 12.14.

New MIUI 12.5 Features

Approximate Location

MIUI 12.5 will protect your location privacy better. With the new feature added, you can notify the application of your approximate location, not your exact location. In this way, the application cannot follow you.

New Volume Controller

The volume controller, which has not changed for a long time, will have a much more elegant appearance with MIUI 12.5. A new function has not been added, but it has new animations and a new look.

New Launcher Animations

The animation when folder and extracting the app has been improved.

New Power Menu

There are no new functions or features. Design has been improved

Convert Photo to PDF

You can quickly convert any photo to PDF in your gallery.

New Latest Apps

The latest app style that changed with MIUI 10 is now customizable with MIUI 12.5! With the new update, you can revert to MIUI 9 style. With this feature, the foundation of a structure that allows you to fully interfere with MIUI was laid. With MIUI 12.5, you can use recent apps horizontally.

New camera settings interface

Is the camera application with new features added every day getting complicated? With MIUI 12.5, this complexity has been replaced by a plain interface.

New Cleaner Interface

The cleaner app’s interface got a little more serious.

New Notification Center

With MIUI 12.5, the notification window has been brought closer to the Android 11 view. Notifications, messages and silent notifications are parsed.

Others

  • New Fingerprint Animations
  • Bubble notification support (Android 11)
  • Super resolution
  • Voice control
  • New QR Code interface
  • New Icon styles
  • And More!

The MIUI 12.5 update will likely be released in February. After the MIUI 12.5 update, MIUI 13 and MI 11 will be introduced. One of the first devices to use MIUI 12.5 might be the MI 11.

title.rendered: New details confirm Redmi Note 9 4G will arrive in India as Redmi 9 Power with an additional sensor

content.rendered:
Redmi recently had a device launch in China a couple of days ago, which saw the unveiling of the new Redmi Note 9 series phones. Out of three phones, it’s only the Note 9 4G that sports a new design. The Note 9 Pro 5G and Note 9 5G are both reworked Mi 10T Lite, and it looks like the 4G version is about debut globally. Before the launch, there’s been a rumor that the phone will be coming to the global market. The current information has now confirmed the rumor while hinting at an imminent launch.

Xiaomi just released an update for a device they’re yet to announce. According to the version number, “MIUI 12.0.1.0 QJQINXM,” it shows that the supposed Redmi 9 Power is the same device as the Redmi Note 9 4G, which received its first MIUI 12.0.5.0 QJQCNXM not long ago. Both updates are for the same phone but for different regions, where “IN” in the former means Indian while “CN” in the latter represents Chinese.

Before now, the device already obtained FEC certification, where it appeared with a model number, M2010J1SG. According to the listing, the device will have an additional 2MP Macro sensor and will answer Redmi 9T. It means the global variant will probably have a different camera arrangement, but aside from that, other features of the phone are expected to remain unchanged.

Meanwhile, according to a new line of code, the device might arrive in India as Redmi 9 Power. The information is from the released Xiaomi stock ROM for the Chinese version of the phone. The supposed Redmi 9 power has a model number, M2010J1SI, and will debut with an additional hi259 2MP Macro sensor.

Unfortunately, there’s currently no news as to when these phones – Redmi 9T and Redmi 9 Power – will be making their debut. However, since the company has already released an update for the phones, it means the launch is imminent.

Via

excerpt.rendered: Redmi recently had a device launch in China a couple of days ago, which saw the unveiling of the new Redmi Note 9 series phones

title.rendered: Turkish motorcycle driver found the perfect solution for avoid getting caught by the radar

content.rendered:
A motorcycle rider resorted to an interesting solution to avoid getting caught on the radar during speed overruns, but this solution was noticed by the traffic police. The driver, who changed the numbers on his licence plate with black tape, was fined ₺ 505.

The motorcycle rider, whose plate had the end of 976, converted the numbers 9 and 6 to 8 using black tape and made his plate appear as 878 on the radar. Although this change managed to mislead the radar, it did not go unnoticed by the traffic police. Traffic police, who noticed the awkwardness in the license plate after stopping the motorcycle in question, U.B. he revealed the ruse of the citizen named.

A motorbike driver who made his plate read incorrectly by replacing it with tape, so that it was not attached to the radar app, was fined ₺ 505 for “making the plate read differently.” Of course, it is not known how many excessive speeding penalty has been avoided by changing the plate of the motorcycle driver in question.

Source

excerpt.rendered: A motorcycle rider resorted to an interesting solution to avoid getting caught on the radar during speed overruns, but this solution was noticed by the traffic police

title.rendered: Xiaomi has pulled the MIUI 12 update yet again and now rolling a stable MIUI 11 update to the global Redmi Note 8 users

content.rendered:
In less than 24 hours, Xiaomi has rolled out a new MIUI 12 update to the global Redmi Note 8 users, pulled it back, and is currently pushing a new stable MIUI 11 update. That’s surprising really, but Xiaomi, when it comes to updates, is full of surprises and won’t stop surprising us. However, it seems the new MIUI 12 update that started rolling out yesterday didn’t make it to a handful of phones, especially those on V11.0.11.0. It was because of that particular version that the first rollout was pulled, and it seems the recent update that arrived yesterday couldn’t fix the problem, resulting in a new stable MIUI 11 update for the global Redmi Note 8 users.

The new stable MIUI 11 update that’s currently hitting the global Redmi Note 8 users has a version number, V11.0.12.0 PCOMIXM, and it’s based on Android Pie. It’s basically an upgrade from the buggy v11.0.11.0, and hopefully, that will see everyone receive the MIUI 12 update, eventually. Meanwhile, as per the changelog of the new update, it has bumped the security patch level to November 2020, as well as improved system security and stability.

As to whether you should download the update, we can’t say for now. We are currently keeping a close eye on the development and will update this space once we get more information. Hopefully, Xiaomi will explain why it had to roll out a new stable MIUI 11 update for the global Redmi Note 8 users barely 24 hours after a new MIUI 12 update was released. Nevertheless, if you’re still on V11.0.11.0, it makes sense to download the update as you have nothing to lose.

 

Download the new stable MIUI 11 update for the global Redmi Note 8

  • Device: Redmi Note 8
  • Version: V11.0.12.0.PCOMIXM
  • Android: 9
  • Type: Recovery
    • Download
    • OTA for V11.0.11.0

excerpt.rendered: In less than 24 hours, Xiaomi has rolled out a new MIUI 12 update to the global Redmi Note 8 users, pulled it back, and is currently pushing a new stable MIUI 11 update

title.rendered: Flagship processor Snapdragon 875’s release date announced

content.rendered:
It’s that time of the year when we start expecting the launch of a new flagship processor from Qualcomm. The company usually debuts a new premium chip alongside a Snapdragon 700-series SoC during its annual summit, which holds towards the tail of every year. And going by an official report, Qualcomm will be having its annual summit on December 1, which is a couple of days from today. The two-day event, which will be held in Hawaii, will see the Snapdragon 875 debut alongside a Snapdragon 700-series SoC. The duo will support 5G connectivity, and according to reports, will debut with next-generation face recognition and AI technologies.  

The Snapdragon 875, Meanwhile, is built on a 5nm node and uses a 1+3+4 Octa-Core formation, where the individual core will make use of the recently released ARM Cortex-X1 architecture. It has a frequency speed of up to 3.0GHz, and that means about a 20% uplift in performance over the predessesor. The three A78 based cores will clock at 1.84GH while the four power-efficient A55 cores clock at 1.8GHz. We also expect an improved Adreno 660 GPU, and with a Qualcomm X60 modem, maximum download speed might exceed 7Gbps. 

It has been alleged that some OEMs will be getting exclusive privileges with the flagship processor Snapdragon 875. Xiaomi is expected to release the first Snapdragon 875-powered phone in China, while Samsung will debut the Chipset globally.  Qualcomm is yet to make any comment on that nor the OEMs involved. They’ve, however, released a list of some smartphone makers’ CEOs that will deliver a speech on that day. On the list are Xiaomi Chief Executive Lei Jun, President of Sony Mobile, Mitsuya Kishida, and OnePlus CEO, Kyle Kiang. 

Seeing Xiaomi CEO on the list could mean the company, among others, are soon going to debut a phone running the flagship processor Snapdragon 875 SoC. We hope to find out more during the December 1 event when they will deliver their speech. Of course, it’s going to be live-streamed, given the COVID-19 safety rules.

excerpt.rendered: It’s that time of the year when we start expecting the launch of a new flagship processor from Qualcomm
